title: WTT: My greenbacks for your rare backs.
author: Chicago206

posts.post_title: WTT: My greenbacks for your rare backs.
posts.post_content:
New collector here who is wanting to add a few rare backs to my tiny collection. All I have to trade is cash. Looking for PSA 1.5-2.5 or SGC 20-30 examples of Uzit, Lenox, BroadLeaf, Drum, and CB. Strongly prefer non-portrait poses of common players...cant afford HOFers. Any help is appreciated. You can contact me at:

[url]golddigger10932@hotmail.com[/url]

Thanks!
Nobody with a few extras willing to sell to a noob?
Ok, was able to score a Hindu brown....who is next? Help me spend my cash!!!
If I cant get an Uzit, Lenox, or Drum low grade common player on this site, should I just give up on my quest?

[quote name="Chicago206" post=784514]If I cant get an Uzit, Lenox, or Drum low grade common player on this site, should I just give up on my quest?[/quote]
 
There are multiple copies of what you are looking for available several times a year. You might be a little more patient. The hobby might not be real fun if you aren't. I have a T206 Johnson Lenox but I think he is a bit out of what it sounds like your range is. All of my others are in my personal collection.;....good luck in the hunt (Which is half the fun anyway)
Its just very frustrating Leon. But my struggle continues!
Hang in there. Give it at least another week. Or two.

It does get frustrating. You should try to log and date your collection. This way you can see the progress. 

I have been collecting the t206 Baltimore team for years-at the biginning I could add a front/back combo about once every other week or so. In one six month period I added 3 Broad Leafs-I have not added another BL in 3 years and have only found 2 new additions to my collection in the past year and 3 in the  past 2 years.

It is really neat to go back and look where my collection stood in 2000 or 2002. I didn't keep any records to speak of before 2000.
